def has_stove(sink: item):
    # Determine whether the pot has a stove nearby
    symbol has_stove = exists stove: item : is_stove(stove) and close(stove, sink)
    return has_stove

behavior fill_water(pot: item, sink: item):
    # Define the behavior to fill the pot with water
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(pot)
        achieve has_water(pot)

behavior place_pot_on_stove(pot: item, stove: item):
    body:
        achieve on(pot, stove)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a pot
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink

        if has_stove(sink):
            bind stove: item where:
                is_stove(stove) and close(stove, sink)
            fill_water(pot, sink)
            place_pot_on_stove(pot, stove)
